title: Detect $document.on('click', function(event) {} on $uibmodal
body:
I'm using below code in custom directive to detect a click anywhere on page.

$document.on('click', function(event) {
        event.preventDefault();
        event.stopPropagation();
        $scope.$apply(function() {
          $log.info('doc click')
        });
        $document.off('click', event);
      });

Code is working fine But while using the directive in an uibmodal the $document.on('click', function(event) { } is not logging anything.
